notes: Only appears during the [[The Lightbearer]] event.
name: Midnight Spawn
location: Forbidden Lands around [https://tibia.fandom.com/wiki/Mapper?coords=128.251-127.50-7-4-1-1 the Lightbringer's basin].
strategy: Bring a [[Dwarven Ring]] to avoid luring other strong creatures like [[Behemoth]] or [[Massive Earth Elemental]]. Use [[Energy Bomb|Energy Bombs]] to protect yourself from them and the Behemoths.
